overview.en: IoTeX is the auto-scalable and privacy-centric blockchain infrastructure for the Internet of Things (IoT). It brings autonomous device coordination to the masses by “connecting the physical world, block by block.”
overview.zh: IoTeX是面向物联网的可自动扩展和以隐私为中心的区块链基础架构，致力于实现异构计算，Roll-DPoS共识机制和轻量级隐私等底层创新，推动物联网区块链3.0生态系统。
